mapper.select: select id, freight_model_id, first_weight, first_weight_freight, ten_price, fifty_price, hundred_price, trihun_price, above_price, region_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified from order.weight_freight_model where id = #{id}

select id, freight_model_id, first_weight, first_weight_freight, ten_price, fifty_price, hundred_price, trihun_price, above_price, region_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified from order.weight_freight_model limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into order.weight_freight_model(freight_model_id, first_weight, first_weight_freight, ten_price, fifty_price, hundred_price, trihun_price, above_price, region_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (#{freightModelId}, #{firstWeight}, #{firstWeightFreight}, #{tenPrice}, #{fiftyPrice}, #{hundredPrice}, #{trihunPrice}, #{abovePrice}, #{regionId}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified})
mapper.update:
update order.weight_freight_model
freight_model_id = #{freightModelId},
first_weight = #{firstWeight},
first_weight_freight = #{firstWeightFreight},
ten_price = #{tenPrice},
fifty_price = #{fiftyPrice},
hundred_price = #{hundredPrice},
trihun_price = #{trihunPrice},
above_price = #{abovePrice},
region_id = #{regionId},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
where id = #{id}
